law.catch_line: Needy Disabled Persons; Neglect Or Refusal Of Parents To Support; Penalty
law.text: The father or mother of any needy disabled person who unreasonably neglects or refuses to provide for the support and maintenance of such person shall be punished by a fine of not more than five hundred dollars or by imprisonment for not more than two years, or both.
